data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Figueroa, Manuel Tierno De, Sánchez-Tocino, Luis (2009): Loxosomella almugnecarensis n. sp. (Entoprocta: Loxosomatidae) — a new sponge epizoite from the Iberian Mediterranean Sea. Zootaxa 2236: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190445
